name: Add records to Data Store from Google Forms responses and send a Slack message
description: Every time a form response is submitted on Google Forms, Make will automatically validate the email address. If the email is valid it will add the form data to Data store and send a Slack message. This example uses the responses in [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KytET6Ql0u9ogzaERz24YrLQEusOn7Iwa8dN6B0dFNY/edit#gid=964126193).
